医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
每天只需活动五分钟即可降低血压每天适度的锻炼（只要五分钟）就可以降低血压，而较长的活动时间则具有显着的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Just-五分钟-of-activity-a-day-could-reduce-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Just- Five-millions-of-activity-a-day-could-reduce-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16a77843-5fea-4ca3-8a7b-e4c9e5f168ff Mon, 11 Nov 2024 10:50:00 -0500 Just five minutes of activity a day could reduce blood pressure
饮用非发酵奶可能会增加女性患心脏病的风险该研究表明，未发酵牛奶可能会增加女性患缺血性心脏病的风险，敦促人们更仔细地研究乳制品消费及其对健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Drinking-non-fermented-milk-may-increase-the-risk-of-heart-disease-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Drinking-non-fermented-milk-may-increase-the-risk-of-heart-disease-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=261e1286-1b48-48a5-8dce-f07b9ad7f53b Mon, 11 Nov 2024 10:22:00 -0500 Drinking non-fermented milk may increase the risk of heart disease in women
肠道微生物组的变化与高危人群中类风湿性关节炎的发病有关研究结果表明肠道微生物组多样性的变化先于类风湿性关节炎，这为早期疾病检测的微生物指标提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Gut-microbiome-changes-linked-to-onset-of-rheumatoid-arthritis-among-at-risk-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Gut-microbiome-changes-linked-to-onset-of-rheumatoid-arthritis-among-at-risk-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d816dcc4-ceca-4835-a1cc-e591a8f155fd Mon, 11 Nov 2024 10:03:00 -0500 Gut microbiome changes linked to onset of rheumatoid arthritis among at-risk individuals
GLP-1 和 SGLT2 抑制剂有望预防复发性中风和心脏病一项初步研究表明，GLP-1 受体激动剂和 SGLT2 抑制剂是最常用于治疗 2 型糖尿病或减肥的两类药物，可以降低初次中风的成年人心脏病发作、第二次中风和死亡的风险将在 2024 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/GLP-1-and-SGLT2-inhibitors-show-promise-in-preventing-recurrent-中风-and-heart-attack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/GLP-1-and-SGLT2-inhibitors-show-promise-in-preventing-recurrent-中风-and-heart-attack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbfc5c65-76cc-41d8-948e-2b39b7391ff4 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 08:50:40 -0500 GLP-1 and SGLT2 inhibitors show promise in preventing recurrent stroke and heart attack
β受体阻滞剂与心脏病患者抑郁症增加有关所有心脏病发作的患者通常都使用β受体阻滞剂进行治疗。根据瑞典今年早些时候进行的一项研究，那些具有正常泵血能力的心脏病患者不太可能需要这种药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Beta-blockers-linked-to-increased-depression-in-heart-attack-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Beta-blockers-linked-to-increased-depression-in-heart-attack-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9582e2ce-0fbd-4b15-8cbc-e8870f28aaa9 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 08:47:42 -0500 Beta blockers linked to increased depression in heart attack patients
911 电信设备改善了妇女在心脏骤停期间的心肺复苏 (CPR) 服务与男性相比，女性在公共场合接受心肺复苏 (CPR) 的可能性较低，但根据即将在美国心脏协会 (American Heart Association) 会议上公布的初步研究，当 911 电话通讯器向寻求心脏骤停患者帮助的呼叫者提供救生指示时，这种差异得到了改善。 2024 年复苏科学研讨会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/911-telecommunicators-improve-CPR-access-for-women-during-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/911-telecommunicators-improve-CPR-access-for-women-during-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ef3ebf9-ddc0-4b15-8138-a4f7bdeb4e9e Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:23:39 -0500 911 telecommunicators improve CPR access for women during cardiac arrest
即使没有种族修饰符，MESA 心脏病风险评分也表现良好根据今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上公布的一项初步研究，MESA 心脏病风险评分的一个版本与包含种族的版本一样，不包含种族预测的心脏病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/MESA-heart-disease-risk-score-performs-well-even-without-race-modifiers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/MESA-heart-disease-risk-score-performs-well-even-without-race-modifiers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12281410-767b-4490-bf6e-7ad3158ef16e Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:16:15 -0500 MESA heart disease risk score performs well even without race modifiers
CKM 综合征导致生命早期患心血管疾病的风险升高根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项初步研究，患有慢性肾病、2 型糖尿病或两者兼而有之的人预计比没有这些疾病的人早 8 至 28 年患心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CKM-syndrome-leads-to-elevated-cardioangio-disease-risk-earlier-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CKM-syndrome-leads-to-elevated-cardioangio-disease-risk-earlier-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b6cd137-6026-45cf-8943-e0e00ae4a495 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:10:36 -0500 CKM syndrome leads to elevated cardiovascular disease risk earlier in life
红线划线及其对心脏病和糖尿病的持久影响根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项初步研究，心脏病、2 型糖尿病、高血压和肥胖症更为常见，并且与居住在以前受到红线限制的社区的人们获得健康食品的机会减少有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Redlined-and-its- permanent-impact-on-heart-disease-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Redlined-and-its- permanent-impact-on-heart-disease-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e61da974-e145-48ab-a6d8-5803b7ddad3f Mon, 11 Nov 2024 06:51:00 -0500 Redlining and its lasting impact on heart disease and diabetes
CDC 更新临床医生疼痛护理指南疼痛每天影响着数百万美国人的生活，改善疼痛护理和疼痛患者的生活是公共卫生的当务之急。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CDC-updates-pain-care-guidelines-for-clinicians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CDC-updates-pain-care-guidelines-for-clinicians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da89d997-6464-41f2-a0c2-c8909f3381cd Mon, 11 Nov 2024 06:29:46 -0500 CDC updates pain care guidelines for clinicians
